title: (x) Florence Script URW - ITC Zapfe Chancery {Dav}
content:
Help, help, help!

I need to locate/buy Florence Script URW 1992 Flor.ttf

I used this font when creating labels for my daughters herb & spice business. Her computer had a virus & the “so called” techy removed the virus along with some files including this font which is used for hundreds of labels.

I’ve tried URW but it’s not listed but they hold the copyright.

Any ideas would be greatly appreciated!

 [‹ (x) Audio Circus - Spumoni {James}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071011060832/http:/typophile.com/node/13175 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Cuban Council - custom alt:Chalet {Marc, Dav} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071011060832/http:/typophile.com/node/13176 "Go to next forum topic")
author: yarnexpress

comments.content:
_’Florence Script’ seems to be identical to_ ’ [Zapf Chancery](http://web.archive.org/web/20071011060832/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=6&displayfontid=ITC.108296.0.0&fontRendererText=Herb+%26+Spice)’, _by [Hermann Zapf](http://web.archive.org/web/20071011060832/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hermann%252BZapf)_..  
_( If it is indeed similar you may want to use the original, ’Zapf Chancery’, instead.? )_
